煛字的基本解释

煛
jiǒng
大目。
目光。

煛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǒng］
［《廣韻》古迥切，上迥，見。］
(1)大眼睛。
(2)目光。
(3)目惊貌。

煛字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　煛； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页677第13
【廣韻】古迥切【集韻】畎迥切，?音熲。大目也。　又【六書統】目光也。　又人名。師煛。見【宋史·宗室表】。　又與囧通。【書·囧命序傳】伯囧，臣名。亦作煛。　又【集韻】目驚貌。　又【集韻】煚古作煛。註詳火部九畫。

煛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
煛字的起名意思

指大目或目光。

look.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǒng］
["Guangyun" Gu Jiong cut, Shang Jiong, see. ]
(1) Big eyes.
(2) Gaze.
(3) Shocking appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Items and Words Department] 　煛; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 677 13
[Guang Yun] Ancient Jiong cut [Ji Yun] Jiong cut,? Yin Xi. Big eyes too.　[Liu Shu Tong] My eyes are also.　Another name. Teacher cup. See [Song History · Clan Table].　And 囧 again. 【Book·囧Fate Preface】Uncle 囧, the minister's name. Also used as a cup.　[Jiyun] again, shocking look.　[Jiyun] 煚古作煛. Note the nine paintings of the fire department.
